thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 3 of 132
thread.title: Dogmama

author: Dogmama
title: Dogmama
text: Having recently adopted our dog about 3 months ago, we were a little uncertain about leaving him, especially as we just discovered a health issue requiring daily medication. The sitter we usually use wasn't going to be available. Stumbled across Dogvacay, and it was the perfect solution. We found several potential sitters in our area, all charging reasonable fees. We picked 2 to meet with and both were folks we be comfortable leaving our dog with. The sitter we chose was very good with dogs, responsible and we had no worries while we enjoyed our holiday.
